critical_findings.description: CRITICAL: VERIFIED Postgres credentials - IMMEDIATE ACTION REQUIRED
validation_steps: 1. Check if credentials are still active
2. Rotate credentials immediately
3. Review access logs for unauthorized usage
4. Remove from code and Git history
critical_findings.impact: Full database access with verified working credentials

high_findings.verification_error: verification failures: error dialing gitlab.com:22: dial tcp 172.65.251.78:22: i/o timeout, error dialing github.com:22: dial tcp 140.82.116.4:22: i/o timeout
validation_steps: 1. Identify key purpose and system access
2. Generate new key pair if still in use
3. Update systems with new public key
4. Remove private key from repository
5. Audit systems for unauthorized access
high_findings.remediation: Remove immediately and rotate if active
